short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate English words into Chin language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chin Pop-up Dictionary is a browser extension designed for instant Chin language translation and comprehension. It allows users to hover over any English word or phrase to see an immediate translation or definition.
